DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , randomize , double-blind , four-period crossover study investigate effect alcohol pharmacodynamics pharmacokinetics RO4917838 healthy volunteer . Healthy volunteer receive 4 treatment randomize order : single dose RO4917838 alcohol , RO4917838 non-alcoholic drink , placebo RO4917838 alcohol , placebo RO4917838 non-alcoholic drink .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacodynamic Pharmacokinetic Study RO4917838 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy volunteer , 18 45 year , inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day Females , menopausal must agree use two adequate method contraception Any current medical condition disease would render volunteer unsuitable study , would place volunteer undue risk History alcoholism History drug abuse and/or addiction within one year study start History significant disease ( e.g. , cardiovascular , hepatic , renal ) cancer
